name: Hadoop-hdfs
tagline: Steve's Mirror of Apache Hadoop (for libhdfs development)
body:
# LIBHDFS
This is a C/JNI Interface to the Hadoop HDFS file system.
***
# My Involvement
I became involved/interested in this project through my previous employment at Teradata.
***
# Objectives
I hope to merge many of my Teradata enhancements into the Hadoop HDFS project.
***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
